dosage_administration: Dosage and Administration Directions Adults and children over 12 years: ■ clean and dry affected area ■ carefully remove backing from patch starting at corner ■ apply sticky side of patch to affected area ■ use one patch for up to 24 hours. Discard patch after single use. Children under 12 years of age: consult a physician.
indications: Idications and Usage Uses: Temporaily relieves minor pains.
